member.name: CD3D11_TEXTURE1D_DESC.CD3D11_TEXTURE1D_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_TEXTURE1D_DESC structure that is initialized with a structure.
member.param: Address of the structure that initializes the CD3D11_TEXTURE1D_DESC structure.

member.name: CD3D11_TEXTURE1D_DESC.CD3D11_TEXTURE1D_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_TEXTURE1D_DESC structure that is initialized with values.
member.param: A -typed value that specifies the texture format.
Texture width (in texels). The range is from 1 to D3D11_REQ_TEXTURE1D_U_DIMENSION (16384). However, the range is actually constrained by the feature level at which you create the rendering device.

Number of textures in the array. The range is from 1 to D3D11_REQ_TEXTURE1D_ARRAY_AXIS_DIMENSION (2048). However, the range is actually constrained by the feature level at which you create the rendering device.
The maximum number of mipmap levels in the texture. See the remarks in . Use 1 for a multisampled texture; or 0 to generate a full set of subtextures.

A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies how to bind the texture to pipeline stages. For a 1D texture, the allowable values are: D3D11_BIND_SHADER_RESOURCE, D3D11_BIND_RENDER_TARGET and D3D11_BIND_DEPTH_STENCIL.
A -typed value that identifies how the texture is to be read from and written to.
A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies the types of CPU access allowed.
A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value identifies other, less common resource options.

member.name: CD3D11_TEXTURE1D_DESC.CD3D11_TEXTURE1D_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_TEXTURE1D_DESC structure.

member.name: CD3D11_TEXTURE1D_DESC
member.summary: Represents a 1D texture and provides convenience methods for creating 1D textures.
